title: New: Woman’s Hour – Darkest Place
content:
I’m a sucker for this sort of pop.

Lethargic synths and wistful female vocals, London quartet Woman’s Hour tug on the heartstrings with their latest offering, Darkest Place. Twisting and turning before collapsing into a swirling haze of delightful ‘ooo’s and tinkling keys, it’s their most enticing outing to date. Check out Darkest Place below, and keep up with the quartet via Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
